changeSet.author: Siva
Siva
changeSet.sql: DELETE FROM SECRIGHTS WHERE RightName LIKE '%VAS%';

changeSet.author: Siva
Siva

Siva
changeSet.sql: UPDATE bmtaeevents SET ACTIVE = 1 WHERE AEEVENTCODE IN ('VASFEE', 'VASACRUL');

changeSet.author: Siva
changeSet.sql: UPDATE ReportList SET ReportHeading = 'VAS Product Category' where code ='VASProductCategory'; UPDATE ReportList SET ReportHeading = 'VAS Product Type' where code ='VASProductType';

changeSet.author: Siva
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO SECGROUPRIGHTS VALUES((SELECT MAX(GRPRIGHTID)+1 FROM SECGROUPRIGHTS), (SELECT GRPID FROM SECGROUPS WHERE GRPCODE='VASRECORDING_MAKER') ,(SELECT RIGHTID FROM SECRIGHTS WHERE RIGHTNAME='VASRecordingDialog_ReferralId'), 1, 0,1000,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,' ',' ',' ',' ',' ',' ',0);

changeSet.author: Siva
changeSet.createView: SELECT T1.FeeID, T1.FinReference, T1.OriginationFee, T1.FinEvent, T1.FeeTypeID, T1.FeeSeq, T1.FeeOrder, T1.CalculatedAmount, T1.ActualAmount, T1.WaivedAmount, T1.PaidAmount, T1.FeeScheduleMethod, T1.Terms, T1.RemainingFee, T1.PaymentRef, T1.CalculationType, T1.RuleCode, T1.FixedAmount, T1.Percentage, T1.CalculateOn, T1.AlwDeviation, T1.MaxWaiverPerc, T1.AlwModifyFee, T1.AlwModifyFeeSchdMthd, T1.Version, T1.LastMntBy, T1.LastMntOn, T1.RecordStatus, T1.RoleCode, T1.NextRoleCode, T1.TaskId, T1.NextTaskId, T1.RecordType, T1.WorkflowId, T2.FeeTypeCode, T2.FeeTypeDesc, T1.VasReference FROM FinFeeDetail_Temp T1 LEFT JOIN FeeTypes T2 ON T1.FeeTypeID = T2.FeeTypeID

changeSet.author: Siva
changeSet.createView: SELECT T1.FeeID, T1.FinReference, T1.OriginationFee, T1.FinEvent, T1.FeeTypeID, T1.FeeSeq, T1.FeeOrder, T1.CalculatedAmount, T1.ActualAmount, T1.WaivedAmount, T1.PaidAmount, T1.FeeScheduleMethod, T1.Terms, T1.RemainingFee, T1.PaymentRef, T1.CalculationType, T1.RuleCode, T1.FixedAmount, T1.Percentage, T1.CalculateOn, T1.AlwDeviation, T1.MaxWaiverPerc, T1.AlwModifyFee, T1.AlwModifyFeeSchdMthd, T1.Version, T1.LastMntBy, T1.LastMntOn, T1.RecordStatus, T1.RoleCode, T1.NextRoleCode, T1.TaskId, T1.NextTaskId, T1.RecordType, T1.WorkflowId, T2.FeeTypeCode, T2.FeeTypeDesc, T1.VasReference FROM FinFeeDetail_Temp T1 LEFT JOIN FeeTypes T2 ON T1.FeeTypeID = T2.FeeTypeID UNION ALL SELECT T1.FeeID, T1.FinReference, T1.OriginationFee, T1.FinEvent, T1.FeeTypeID, T1.FeeSeq, T1.FeeOrder, T1.CalculatedAmount, T1.ActualAmount, T1.WaivedAmount, T1.PaidAmount, T1.FeeScheduleMethod, T1.Terms, T1.RemainingFee, T1.PaymentRef, T1.CalculationType, T1.RuleCode, T1.FixedAmount, T1.Percentage, T1.CalculateOn, T1.AlwDeviation, T1.MaxWaiverPerc, T1.AlwModifyFee, T1.AlwModifyFeeSchdMthd, T1.Version, T1.LastMntBy, T1.LastMntOn, T1.RecordStatus, T1.RoleCode, T1.NextRoleCode, T1.TaskId, T1.NextTaskId, T1.RecordType, T1.WorkflowId, T2.FeeTypeCode, T2.FeeTypeDesc, T1.VasReference FROM FinFeeDetail T1 LEFT JOIN FeeTypes T2 ON T1.FeeTypeID = T2.FeeTypeID WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM FinFeeDetail_Temp WHERE FeeID = T1.FeeID)

changeSet.author: Siva
changeSet.createView: SELECT T1.FeeID, T1.FinReference, T1.FeeSeq, T1.OriginationFee, T1.FinEvent, T1.FeeTypeID, T1.FeeOrder, T1.CalculatedAmount, T1.ActualAmount, T1.WaivedAmount, T1.PaidAmount, T1.FeeScheduleMethod, T1.Terms, T1.RemainingFee, T1.PaymentRef, T1.CalculationType, T1.RuleCode, T1.FixedAmount, T1.Percentage, T1.CalculateOn, T1.AlwDeviation, T1.MaxWaiverPerc, T1.AlwModifyFee, T1.AlwModifyFeeSchdMthd, T1.Version, T1.LastMntBy, T1.LastMntOn, T1.RecordStatus, T1.RoleCode, T1.NextRoleCode, T1.TaskId, T1.NextTaskId, T1.RecordType, T1.WorkflowId, T2.FeeTypeCode, T2.FeeTypeDesc, T1.VasReference FROM WIFFinFeeDetail_Temp T1 LEFT JOIN FeeTypes T2 ON T1.FeeTypeID = T2.FeeTypeID UNION ALL SELECT T1.FeeID, T1.FinReference, T1.FeeSeq, T1.OriginationFee, T1.FinEvent, T1.FeeTypeID, T1.FeeOrder, T1.CalculatedAmount, T1.ActualAmount, T1.WaivedAmount, T1.PaidAmount, T1.FeeScheduleMethod, T1.Terms, T1.RemainingFee, T1.PaymentRef, T1.CalculationType, T1.RuleCode, T1.FixedAmount, T1.Percentage, T1.CalculateOn, T1.AlwDeviation, T1.MaxWaiverPerc, T1.AlwModifyFee, T1.AlwModifyFeeSchdMthd, T1.Version, T1.LastMntBy, T1.LastMntOn, T1.RecordStatus, T1.RoleCode, T1.NextRoleCode, T1.TaskId, T1.NextTaskId, T1.RecordType, T1.WorkflowId, T2.FeeTypeCode, T2.FeeTypeDesc, T1.VasReference FROM WIFFinFeeDetail T1 LEFT JOIN FeeTypes T2 ON T1.FeeTypeID = T2.FeeTypeID WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WIFFinFeeDetail_Temp WHERE FinReference = T1.FinReference AND OriginationFee = T1.OriginationFee AND FinEvent = T1.FinEvent AND FeeTypeID = T1.FeeTypeID)

changeSet.author: Siva
